document_data.name: Ailon Finch
document_data.mainbody: Ailon Finch was a cloth merchant in [[Ylraphon]]. He was slain by a [[black dragon]] in the [[Rage of Dragons]] of {{yearlink|1373}}.{{cite book/The Rage||3}}
document_data.Description: He was balding and heavyset. His voice was a little strangled the night he died, probably because of too tight a [[cuirass]].
document_data.Possessions: The merchant wore a cuirass two sizes too small on the night he died.
document_data.History: On [[Hammer 23]], Ailon Finch was abruptly woken up after [[Dorn Graybrook]] roused the local council of merchants to warn them of the signs of a [[Rage of Dragons]]. He was magically blinded and then slain that night by a black dragon.
